column1: full, on off. On the money first ball. Pushed to cover for a quick single, where a misfield allows them to pinch the run with ease
length ball, on middle, angling down leg, and flicked along the way to fine leg for four
full, on off, and driven to cover
good length, on off and angling away. Tapped to cover
the keeper goes flying to his left to stop the ball. Length ball on leg, and seaming down the leg side. A bit awry
full, on off, and the attempted drive flies off the bat's inside half. Rolls down to long on
full, on middle, and he presses forward to push this back
full, outside off, and angling away. Throws his hands at this to drive a shot past the diving mid-off fielder
full, outside leg stump, and whipped past the fielder scampering at deep backward square. Gift from the bowler, and Banton doesn't miss out
full, just outside off, and he mistimes a muscled shot over the bowler's head. Mid off and mid on scurry across the ground to stop it from getting to the boundary

Eliis takes a skyer! Full, on off again, and he goes for the big slog over mid on. But slices the shot, and the skyer goes to the fielder at deep backward square leg who does well to keep his eyes on the ball. Not easy against the overcast grey clouds in the background
good length, outside off. Stands tall to guide a cut to point
full, on off, and punched through the gap near cover. They hurry back for the second
back of a length on off. Tries to pull but the ball whizzes past his ear to McDermott
full outside off. Angling further away and Lynn wants to clatter it through cover. Makes zero connection though...
full, outside off, and the drive is fairly uppish. Shouts of 'catch it' as the ball soars over the head of the fielder at cover before dribbling across the boundary for four
back of a length, on middle. Fended off the back foot
clubbed! Full, on off, and he muscles this over the non-striker's head. Bryant was ducking for cover early...
slapped! Slower ball, length delivery, angling away and Lynn frees his arms to cut through the infield
full, on leg. Controls his instincts to nudge the ball into the square-leg gap
full, outside off, and driven to cover
full, on off, and he comes down the wicket for a wild hoick. Sliced over point and cover point, and three fielders give the ball a chase
good length, on off. Too close to his body for the cut. Finds point
tracer bullet! Good length on off, and he backs away before freeing his arms to absolutely drill a shot over the fielder at cover point. 'Pulverised', says the TV commentator
full, on middle, cramping him for space. Driven to cover
fullish, on middle. Punched to cover once more
full, on leg, and he goes through the shot by clearing his front leg and lofting it over mid on
full outside off, and turning away. Looks to drive, but looks very uncomfortable. Through to the keeper
full, on off, and he picks the legbreak to smash a shot over mid off! Toe-ended shot, but he'll take it
good length on off, and turning away. Looks to work it leg-side but a leading edge lobs the ball in the air. Lands safe though
length ball, skidder into his pads. Nudged into the gap on the leg side
that's the flipper. Full and fast outside off and going straight through with the line. He looks to defend but the ball goes past his outside edge. Qais has his hands on his head
good length, outside off. The attempted punch is sliced to point
good length, angling in from around the wicket. Goes deep in his crease and pulls to the cow-corner fence
fullish, on off. Minimal footwork while driving. Mistimed to point
good length, on off. Backs away again and pulls uppishly over the fielder manning the cow-corner boundary. Hits the electronic fence on the full
wider this time. Full way outside off, and he drags the slot to midwicket
full, outside off, and he skips down the wicket before slashing a boundary over the cover region. Massive over
full, outside off and turning away. Tapped to the off side
good length, on middle. Flicked off his hips to the leg side
full, on off. The attempted drive is edged to short third man
width offered, and he slaps a cut to the sweeper-fielder on the off side. This was the faster ball too. 118 kph
placement! Good length, outside off, and he makes room to cut it behind square through the deep-point region
full outside off, and turning away. Lifts it over cover, but long off runs around to cut it off
back of the hand slower ball, full on middle. Launched over the bowler's head, but long on cuts it off
scythed! Width offered, length outside off, and he slaps it through the point region for another boundary.
slower ball again. Full on middle. Lynn wants to slog to cow corner, but is through the shot too early. Ball flies away behind square instead
good length, outside off. Punched to cover
slower ball again, length outside off and Bryant waits for it to get to him before slogging it to the deep midwicket fence
good length, on off, and he comes down the wicket before flat-batting a boundary between the gap at cover and mid off
good length, on off, and cut to point. Bryant wants the run, but Lynn says 'no'
slower through the air. Length on middle, and pushed down the ground to long on
good length, on leg stump. Tapped to square leg for a single
good length, on off and turning away. Cut to deep point
full, outside leg stump. Swept behind square to deep backward square leg
full, on off stump. He skips down the ground to loft it over long on
full, on middle. Swiped leg side to deep midwicket
good length, on leg stump. Makes room to pull, but it hits his body instead. Rolls away to short third man
good length leg cutter outside off, and Bryant wants to go over midwicket. But the shot's been sliced over short third man instead. First fifty of the season
full on middle, and that's come at 150.4kph! Looks to hammer it over midwicket but the ball goes through him. So much heat in that delivery that even the keeper drops the ball
slower ball, back of a length on middle, but Bryant makes room - exposing all three stumps - before slapping a cut over the fielder at point
full on leg stump, following the batsman. Tapped to cover for a single. Heat 100/1 after ten
pushed away to deep point
edged past the keeper as McDermott doesn't make any contact. Good length on middle, and turning away. Ball was too close to Lynn's body for the cut. He's lucky to be still around
yorker length, just outside off. Hammered to deep point
slower through the air. Full on middle, and he leans into a slog sweep that goes beyond the man at deep midwicket. Dropped by a fan in the stands too

finds the fielder at cover! Another length ball, turning away, and he makes room to cut. Struck well, without a doubt, but a fielder was placed there for the shot. Bryant impresses but has to return now
good length, on off. Punched to deep midwicket
reverse paddled past Rose at short third man. This was a full toss too. But Rose does well to recover and dive to stop the ball from dribbling over the boundary
yorker length, on leg stump. Drilled to long on
full, on leg stump. Clipped off his toes to deep midwicket
full, on leg, and he gets down on one knee to sweep behind fine leg for a boundary. Quick swivel from Lynn
good length, outside off, and turning further away. Swivels and pulls into the stands! That's another $250 to his bushfire contribution
full and wide outside off, and driven to the fielder in the deep
good length, on middle. He pulls along the ground to deep backward square leg
good length, on off and turning away. Cut to point
full outside off, and driven away from his body to extra cover
tapped away
full outside off, and driven away from his body to extra cover
first over without a boundary as Renshaw drives this full ball to long off
full, on leg, and clipped to deep midwicket
slower ball, full outside off. Driven to extra cover
full, outside off, and pushed to mid off. Says 'no' for the run
goes for the yorker, but doesn't have the accuracy. Low full toss, and clipped over midwicket. Another BBL fifty - his 18th in 68 games
gets the yorker perfectly this time. Full and wide...Lynn makes no connection
full, outside off, and he walks across the stumps before drilling a shot to midwicket
full, on off, and he slow sweeps into the gap near deep midwicket. Targetting the short boundary
flat-batted over the bowler's head for another four. Makes room, and Short offers him the half-tracker to make full use of
full, outside leg stump. Lynn swivels to slog sweep again, but this time the ball hits his chest
flatter, length on leg. Makes room to cut to deep point
good length, outside off, and he drags a slogged shot into the deep midwicket fence! A man with a purple hat takes a catch in the stands
even better! Full, on leg stump, and he goes down on one knee before extending his arms through the slog over wide long on

head high full toss but luckily for Lynn that's the slower ball. Lynn spots it and tries to ramp it over the keeper, but doesn't get the best contact. Keeper does well to dive and stop the ball from going for more runs. Meredith warned by the umpire...
yorker length on leg stump, but Renshaw shuffles across - exposing all three stumps - before paddling it fine past the infielder behind square. Ridiculous!
back of a length, on middle. Forcing him to fend it off the back foot
full, on middle, and flicked into the gap on the leg side. They return for the second
full, on off. Rolls his fingers over the ball. Driven to extra cover

through Short's hands! Back of a length, on middle, and he tries to pull from above his head. In the air for ages as Short - from midwicket - runs to mid on to try and take the catch, but he cannot complete the difficult catch
back of a length, on middle. Guided to third man for a jogging run
short ball, quicker on, outside off stump. Pulled to deep midwicket. 116kph
full, on leg stump. Makes room before hammering a six over long off. That's another $250 for a good cause
follows it up with a yorker on leg stump. Bunted back
full toss, on leg stump, from around the wicket. Clobbered to deep midwicket
taken at fine leg as Renshaw top edges a sweep. Qais trusts his legbreak, going full and turning it in. Ellis reverse cups this to take his second catch of the evening
full toss, on off. Pushed to wide long off
full toss, wide outside off, and he walks across before dragging a checked shot to deep midwicket for four
in the slot, full on off, and he creams a lofted shot over the diving fielder at wide long on
low full toss, wide outside off, and he throws his bat at this to slap a four through cover
full, on off. Clears his front leg and hammers a shot to long on. Mistimed on this occasion though
yorker length, on off. Dug away to wide long on
full, outside off, and drilled to long off. Keeps the strike
full, on off. Cutting swipes it past his pads to fine leg
back of a length, digging into the pitch. Lynn makes room and pulls to deep midwicket
back of a length, on off. 148.1kph from Meredith. Cutting looks to pull, but the ball's through him early
full, outside leg stump since he saw the batsman making room. Clipped to square leg
good length, on leg. Sliced over the leg side, but in the vacant region between midwicket and the deep. Riding his luck...
good length, on middle, and he swivels to hammer a flat-batted pull to wide long on!
full and wide outside off. Dug down to long on, and a quick scamper allows them to pinch the second
full and wide, beyond the tramlines, but adrenaline gets the better of Lynn. Clatters it back to Ellis
full and wide outside off again, but this time Lynn walks across to access the ball better. Swiped to long on
into the corporate box! Low full toss on off, and he uses the long handle to clip a shot off his toes over deep midwicket
length ball, outside off, and he slaps a shot over the bowler's head for four more! That's their highest BBL score
full and wide outside off. Struck to deep point Heat have made 212 for 3
length ball outside off. Punched to extra cover
good length, on middle, angling further down leg. Jewell flicks off his hips down to fine leg
good length, outside off, and shaping further away. Tries to cut but misses. Through to the keeper
beautiful shape with this length ball that straightens after pitching. Jewell defends down the wrong line and the ball goes past his edge to the keeper
fullish, outside off. And Tapped away to point
full and wide outside off, but Jewell walks into the ball's line before mistiming an attempted paddle to square leg for a single

dropped.... and six! Steketee the guilty man. This was full on off, and the attempted slog sweep didn't have the distance. Steketee slides across to take the catch, but his back leg was hovering over the boundary anyway
good length, on middle, and he slog sweeps behind square on this occasion. Muscled over square leg for another four
punched to wide long on
full, on leg stump. Looks to sweep but goes down the leg side
fullish, outside off. The attempted straight drive flies away to the leg side
full, on off. Driven to cover
full on middle. Looks to flick, but inside-edged onto his pads
good length, on off, and he mistimes the punch to midwicket
good length, on off, and punched to the leg side once again
full, on off. Wants to muscle a drive through the covers, but not off the bat's middle
back of a length, on middle. Looks to check a pull to the leg side, but the ball hits his edge and then tonks his helmet grille
back of a length, outside off, and he drags a pull from beyond off for four
full, on leg stump, and thumped straight back. Hits Lalor on his shins, and he's not hurt either
good length on middle. Turning into Jewell, but cut through point for a couple more
good length, on leg, and swept over short fine leg. They commit to the third run as well...
good length, outside off, and turning in. Punched to long on for a single
fullish, outside off. Rocks back and fends to cover
length ball, outside off stump. Makes room and cuts through the point region for another four!
length ball, on off. Swivels and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket. They don't allow Zahir to settle
mind blowing! Shuffles to make the bowler think that he's going for the paddle over fine leg but then holds his ground. Steketee goes wide, and instead Jewell ramps it over short third man for a four
bunted to long on off the back foot
back of a length, on middle, and he checks an attempted pull towards deep midwicket
nicked to the keeper! Back of a length, on leg, and he moves across to pull. But feather-touch through to the keeper instead...
full, outside off. Pushed to mid-off. Great timing but finds the fileder
good length, outside off. The attempted drive is squirted away to third man for a single
length ball on middle, and turning into leg. Flicked to midwicket
good length, outside off, and nudged down the ground to mid on for one
full, on leg stump, and turning across the stumps with McDermott backing away. Just past the outside of off stump!
good length, outside off. Cut away to cover point
good length, outside leg stump. Skidding through, and tapped to mid-off

how did that miss the stumps! Full, on leg, forcing McDermott to attempt the drive. Ball goes through him, over leg stump, and past the keeper too. An excellent second over from Zahir after conceding 15 in his first over
back of a length, outside leg stump. Flicked away behind square
massive! Length ball angling in, and he swipes a pull behind square. Great bat swing
into the second tier! Another length ball angling in, and he hammers a pull much squarer on this occasion
fullish, outside off. Crunched to cover for a quick single. The throw from the fielder has hit McDermott since he was trying to dive in. Hit the back of his neck
back of a length, on leg. Cramping him for space. Tucked away to square leg
slower ball, back of a length on leg. Defended with soft hands
reverse swept past third man for four! Sees the ball was landing on off, and thus plays that shot
slower through the air. Length ball on leg, and turning into middle. Worked to the gap near deep midwicket
full, on leg. Swipes behind square, but finds short fine leg
good length, outside off. Punched to long off
good length, on middle. Nudged around the corner for another run
full, just outside off, and the ball goes under his bat as he tries to drive. Misses the stumps, and hits the keepers pads instead
full, on leg stump. Worked off his toes to deep midwicket
full, on off, and drilled to long off for a walking single
yorker length, just outside off. Dug away to mid off
back of a length, outside off. Wants to cut, but deceived by the (lack of) pace. Mistimes the shot to the leg side for a single
full on middle. Bowling stump to stump, and the batsman offers the full face of the bat. Long off cleans up
yorker length, outside off. Shoveled to long on. Tidy over from Laughlin
good length, outside off. Punched to cover
good length on middle, but McDermott walks down the wicket before swiping a shot down deep midwicket's throat. Soft dismissal and the change of bowler has worked
good length, on middle. Tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
full, on leg stump. Driven to long on for a walking single
fullish, on off. Muscles this slower ball to deep midwicet
good length, outside off, and cut to the fielder in the deep. Prestwidge with some awesome commitment in the deep, diving across the grass
he's thrown it away! Full, on off, and he goes for the reverse sweep. But he's totally tangled up. Off stump pegged back and the part-timer strikes
full, on leg stump. Pushed to long on
full, on leg stump. Driven to long on
full, outside off, and he muscles a drive to wide long off for a single
full, on leg stump. Driven to long off
full and wide. Dug away to the gap near deep extra cover. They take the second
full and wide outside off. Ball goes to the keeper on the bounce
good length, outside off. And scooped over the non-striker's head to long off
good length, outside off. Angling further away, and cut to point
full and wide outside off. Mistimed to long off for a single
good length, outside off, and he crunches a cut in front of square. Fielder in the deep dives full stretched, but the ball goes past his fingertips
full and wide outside off. Low full toss, and clattered to extra cover

Bryant has taken a catch, but isn't celebrating just yet. This short ball was pulled to deep midwicket... and the fielder took the catch near the boundary, but his back leg hit the boundary skirting before he threw the ball back in the air. Although Bryant completed the catch thereafter, because Bryant's foot was touching the boundary, that's been given a six
slower ball, wide outside off. Driven through the covers, and the ball has gone through Renshaw in the infield. Allows them to take the extra second run
full, on leg stump. Flicked to square leg
full on off, and driven to long off! Fielder does well to stop the ball near the ropes
edged and the keeper makes no mistake. Full outside off, and the attempted drive takes the outside edge. Done in by the wide slower ball
length ball, just outside off. Fended away to cover
good length, outside off. Too close to his body for the cut. Edged down to third man. Laughlin still going at only six per over tonight
full on leg, and swept to deep backward square
full, and a dipper on leg stump, but Milenko clears his front leg before sweeping behind square for four
top-edged and taken at short fine leg. Goes for the sweep, and the ball turning away sends the ball into the night sky
full outside off, and turning further away. Lokms to drive and misses
full, on middle. Turning in, and driven to long on
length ball, angling away. Cut in front of square to Bryant in the deep
full toss, wide outside off, and creamed through cover. Laughlin's standing on the 30-yard circle to take that catch, but the ball has burst through his fingers. Dropped
full and wide outside off. Shoveled over extra cover, but the fielder's tidy work in the deep ensures they can't turn back for the second
excellent ball. Full and wide outside of, but Ellis makes room instead. Ball finishes inside the tramlines so the umpire calls it a dot

toes it to cover! Back of a length, slower ball on off, and he looks to scoop it over the infield, but was through the shot too early. Finds the bottom-half of the bat, and Renshaw makes no mistake on the 30-yard circle
full on off stump, and he golf-swings it over wide long on! In the slot...
wide yorker angling away from Bailey. He can't connect, but this time the ball has gone over the tramlines
yorker length, outside off. Dug away to extra cover
full, outside leg stump, but Bailey clears his front leg before hammering a six behind square! Ball takes a bounce and goes beyond the stadium fencing...
straight to long on. Steketee goes full again, cramping Bailey. He tries to lift it over the bowler's head, but didn't have the distance. Is that the final nail in their coffin?
lands in the gap near fine leg as he mistimes the pull behind him
back of a length, on middle. Fends the bumper away to cover
tucks this short ball around the corner
left alone! Short ball, outside off, and he offers no shot
full toss, on middle. Flicked to deep midwicket
slower ball, wide outside off, and Rose creams a drive through the off side
yorker length, on leg stump. Clipped away to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle. Goes for the pull but the ball goes over his shoulder. Qais gives out a smile
slower ball, outside off, and he wants to muscle a cut behind point. But Qais misses, and Pierson bobbles it as well. Short third man runs in to recover the stray ball
full, on leg stump. Nurdled down to long on
full on leg, and flicked over to Zahir at fine leg
yorker length, on off. Bunted down to long on
full, outside off, and he skips down the ground to hammer a boundary. Past his bat to the keeper

back of a length, on middle, and he swirls to pull behind square. Renshaw's inside the boundary line, so he's struggling to take the catch, but he sticks his right hand out to take a stunning catch! But my oh my, Prestwidge has overstepped, and therefore the best catch of the BBL will not be counted! Oh dear
yorker length, outside off, and sliced over point for a boundary
full, on leg, and flicked past the keeper for a boundary
full, on leg stump. Pushed back to mid off
full, outside off. Attempts to muscle it oer cover but misses
yorker length, on leg stump. Dug back to the bowler
full, on leg stump. Tries to punch straight and inside-edges it to mid-on
back of a length, on off stump. Paddles it over his head to short fine leg
shotttt! That should give the crowd something to smile about. Short on middle. and hooks one over fine leg! Appeared to be played on purpose....
full outside off, and the attempted drive takes the outside edge. Past the vacant slip region for another four
yorker length, on middle. Dug away to deep midwicket
full, and wide down the leg side
back of a length, on off, and he looks to ramp but misses
full outside off, and he lofts it over the infield. But Lalor gets under it from extra cover to complete the catch
dropped by the keeper diving to his right. Full and wide, and the drive finds a thick outside edge
clips off stump as the full toss is missed by Meredith. Wayward delivery, not sure Prestwidge was attempting that
full and wide outside off. Misses the shot and Heat win by 31 runs
